hopobject.name: ONAS
hopobject.body:
The ONAS is an open source project aimed at realizing a fully featured NAS.
The OMAP3530 easily allows to connect the NAS to a TV set, home network and internet and supports hard disks and SD cards.
In the DIY community, NAS are usually implemented on old desktops or laptops.
The ONAS may become an interesting alternative.
hopobject.shortdesc: An open source NAS based on OMAP3530 running linux
